de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.threadutils
Class TaskQueueBase

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.threadutils.TaskQueueBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DereferencingTaskQueue, URISearchTaskQueue
public abstract class TaskQueueBase
extends Thread

A base class for task queues that manage a pool of threads which execute the queued tasks. This queue is implemented as a thread itself. New tasks are assigned to free threads. If all threads are busy a new task is queued and its execution is postponed until a thread becomes free.

Author:
Olaf Hartig
